TA Design

Quality, research and development 100% Made in Italy

TA Design projects and manufactures bioclimatic or fabric pergolas and every type of awning to furnish your outdoor spaces stylishly allowing you to make the most of them, managing the perfect natural lighting of every indoor environment.
In every season and at all times of the day.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column top_padding_phone=”100px” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” Mission

Reinventing solar shading by thinking outside the box

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”fullwidth-columns-row” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column top_padding_desktop=”200px” constrain_group_100=”yes” bottom_padding_desktop=”200px” top_padding_tablet=”100px” constrain_group_102=”yes” bottom_padding_tablet=”100px” top_padding_phone=”60px” constrain_group_104=”yes” bottom_padding_phone=”60px” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”advanced” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text]
Vision

To build an open and human-friendly future, like the spaces we address

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text]

People in beyond activities

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”1100″]

Our staff has well-defined tasks and roles within our company, but they never lose sight of the common goals: product care, quality of service and customer relationship.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”650″]Our focus is always on research and innovation, without ever losing sight of our origin as an artisan business, made up of passion, care and attention to customer needs.

That is why we create unique solutions tailored to each customer’s needs and to be able to fit best into any environment.

Our goals are product care, service quality, and customer care, in all their expressions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Ever-evolving ideas

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”650″]In more than 40 years of operations, we have grown dynamically and technologically, becoming a well-established national player, without losing sight of our company’s cornerstone: listening to our customers’ needs.

The absolute opposite of the ordinary!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” max_width_custom=”80px” el_class=”image-icon image-icon-white-bg”][vc_column_text]

Ideas

Our strength lies in our continuously evolving ideas that enable us to offer more and more innovative solutions.[/vc_column_text][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1676629896601-3″ tab_id=”1676629896602-2″ title=”Item”][image_with_animation image_url=”2011″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”None” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”custom” max_width_custom=”80px” el_class=”image-icon image-icon-white-bg”][vc_column_text]

People

Our team strives daily to find the best opportunities and, if they do not find them, create them.[/vc_column_text][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1676629896622-0″ tab_id=”1676629896622-7″ title=”Item”][image_with_animation image_url=”2015″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”None” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”custom” max_width_custom=”80px” el_class=”image-icon image-icon-white-bg”][vc_column_text]

Innovation

Our innovation lies in our ability to imagine the future and change it, growing and improving. Always.[/vc_column_text][/item][/carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_image=”2278″ bg_position=”left top” background_image_loading=”default” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”200px” constrain_group_1=”yes” bottom_padding=”200px” right_padding_desktop=”30%” top_padding_tablet=”100px” constrain_group_3=”yes” bottom_padding_tablet=”100px” right_padding_tablet=”0″ top_padding_phone=”60px” constrain_group_5=”yes” bottom_padding_phone=”60px” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient=”linear-gradient(126deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.689) 10%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 90%)” advanced_gradient_angle=”126″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”advanced” shape_type=”” advanced_gradient_display_type=”linear”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Work with us!

We are always looking for new ideas and willingness to innovate!

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Extra-Color-2″ solid_text_color_override=”#000000″ icon_family=”none” text=”Apply now!”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_global_section id=”24″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
